firstCard.title: Locked door problem
firstCard.description: Intervention in Paris and throughout Île-de-France, 7 days a week, 24 hours a day, for all problems with slammed or locked doors, changing locks or cylinders.

thirdCard.title: Guaranteed door opening
thirdCard.description: Because nothing is more important to us than your complete satisfaction, we provide quality services. At Raphael Serrurerie, you have the assurance of honest prices and no additional costs.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: We offer a wide range of services to meet all your locksmith needs.

firstCard.title: Lock <underline>installation</underline>
firstCard.firstPoint: • Installation of locks <italic>(3,5,7 points)</italic> all brands
firstCard.secondPoint: • Installation of cylinders and safety locks for all brands
firstCard.thirdPoint: • Repair of all types of locks
firstCard.subtitle: Intervention in less than 30 minutes

secondCard.title: <underline>Emergency</underline> repair
secondCard.secondPoint: • Opening of a locked door with keys
secondCard.subtitle: Fair and fixed price known in advance

thirdCard.title: <underline>Security</underline> consulting
thirdCard.subtitle: All our prices are approved by insurance

Prices.title: Prices

table.two: Opening a locked door with keys
table.six: Change of 3,5,7 point high security locks

Prices.firstSubtitle: *Prices from, do not hesitate <link>to contact us via the contact section</link> for a more precise estimate and obtain a fixed price known in advance.
Prices.secondSubtitle: For any other services not on the list, do not hesitate <link>to contact us via the contact section</link> for a personalized quote.

firstStep.title: Step 1 - Contact
firstStep.description: Contact us on WhatsApp, by email or by phone.

secondStep.title: Step 2 - Estimate
secondStep.description: Send us a photo to allow us to estimate <important>a fixed and clear price, agreed in advance</important> for your problem, which will not change during the intervention.

thirdStep.title: Step 3 - Appointment
thirdStep.description: I will come to help you out, or we will arrange an appointment together depending on the service.

Footer.description: Specializing in opening slammed and locked doors throughout Paris and Île-de-France, we replace and install all secure locks using reliable equipment at the best value for money. Because nothing is more important to us than your complete satisfaction, we provide quality services. At Raphaël Serrurerie, you have the assurance of honest prices and no additional costs.
